subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Shani Davis of the United States won the 1,000 meters at a World Cup meet in Heerenveen, the Netherlands. Davis, who also won the 1,500 on Friday, finished in 1:08.99. Pekka Koskela of Finland was second in 1:09.05, and Simon Kuipers of the Netherlands was third in 1:09.26. Davis leads the overall standings.
